mention.text: medellin , 11 sep 89 -- pablo pelaez gonzales , 45 , a former mayor of medellin , was murdered today by gunmen who fired seven shots at him
medellin , which is considered one of the most violent cities in the world
medellin , 200 km to the northwest of bogota
mayor of medellin between 3 may 1984 and the end of 1985
